attributes.action: Support Steven heard fight for disabled and deaf to get jobs as hearing people
attributes.additional_details: Published on 31 Mar 2016A Profoundly Deaf Man from Minehead in the UK, Steven Heard, tells his DLA/PIP Story and how the brutal changes to these benefits, made by the cruel and heartless Tory government under the guise of austerity , affect both him and his family.
attributes.background: I am profound deaf age 47 I been working as a carpenter for 34 year until five year ago because of Heath and safety stop me working because of Heath risk for being deaf

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition in its current form as it does not call for a clear action from the UK Government and Parliament. You could start a petition calling on the Government to provide more support for deaf and disabled people in the workplace.
